name: mnemospark-backend cloud environment
install: bash -lc 'if [ ! -d /workspace/.venv ]; then (command -v python3.13 >/dev/null 2>&1 && python3.13 -m venv /workspace/.venv) || python3 -m venv /workspace/.venv; fi && source /workspace/.venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt'
